Aligning Our Resources to Better Serve Your Business
We’re here for you on this journey, today and in the future.
As the world of business continues to change, we have aligned our resources with your results in mind — now and for the long term.Best-in-class, dedicated partnership
Based on market research, input from focus groups and customer buying trends within various industries, we’ll be deploying dedicated teams of advisors and customer support, so we can work more closely with you.
Benefits you can count on
Local presence and knowledge
Work with a dedicated account manager and support teams who understand local and regional business models. We'll help take care of your supplies, solutions and services, so you can focus on what you do best.
Hands-on support and consistency from product category advisors
Partner with regional product advisors who can help with all your needs beyond office supplies — including facilities, furniture, technology and more.
Geography-based, localized customer care support
Count on a dedicated team of people who are experienced in assisting customers in your specific local area and can quickly address your business needs.
Quarterly business reviews
Participate in strategic engagements that identify quarterly highlights and opportunities — and plan for what’s next with a team who knows your account.
Spend optimization and consolidation
Gain insight based on your business model and initiatives.
From planning to progress
We will continue to monitor the current state of the market and improve our services to optimize your experience with us.
Contact your account manager for more information.
